snippet: HOROWITZ--Renata Gross, The Robin Hood Foundation joins the extended Horowitz, Gross and Epstein families in mourning the loss of 21-year-old Renata Gross Horowitz. Renata was the step-daughter of our beloved colleague and friend, Suzi Epstein. Renata spent a summer working at Robin Hood and we remember her as the brightest light, with the most facile mind and the most committed spirit. "Renata" means born again and through her death she gives life to others. She is permanently in our hearts and our thoughts. The Robin Hood community will ensure that our work and lives are a fitting tribute to her legacy. The staff and board of Robin Hood 1/3
